subtitleSmall: More than 140,000 businesses use iTerms. Join our community of amazing companies!
subtitleBig: Take a look through our answers! Still, have questions? Please don't be afraid to contact our team at any time.

question.title: What is a Privacy Policy?
question.text: If you collect or use personal information, you'll have to comply with privacy laws put in place around the world to protect consumer privacy. These laws will apply regardless of where your business itself is located, as they work to protect consumers in specific regions. For example, if your business is located in the U.S. but you have users in the EU, the EU's GDPR will still apply to you.

question.title: Why do I need a Privacy Policy?
question.text: There are two main reasons why you need a Privacy Policy:
question.subtitle: They`re legally required
question.textTwo: If you collect or use personal information, you'll have to comply with privacy laws put in place around the world to protect consumer privacy. These laws will apply regardless of where your business itself is located, as they work to protect consumers in specific regions. For example, if your business is located in the U.S. but you have users in the EU, the EU's GDPR will still apply to you.
question.textThree: In a world where consumer privacy is more important than ever and consumers are starting to take their privacy more seriously, not having a Privacy Policy can mean you may lose customers. People expect to see a Privacy Policy that they can easily access whenever they want. Not having one will make you seem untrustworthy.
